mods.note: Â© : LLXTLE From political, Bahrain, To Political, Sharjah* Ho* C/a89 Dated the 28 th Jume, 1944 * / Qatar Supplies * As friendly relations have no* teen restored between Bahrain and Qatar it has been decided that the latter should receive certain supplies via Bahrain* please furnish me with details as to the amount of each article which was last supplied to Qatar via the Trucial Coast and how long their stocks are expected to last* I would also like to know what quantity of goods for Qatar is at present on the Trucial Coast awaiting transhipment, and whether an^ further stocks are expected. By 'goods' is meant cereals, sugar,tea, wood and piecegoods* political Agent, Bahrain. BCJ

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains a letter from the Political Agent in Bahrain, Major Tom Hickinbotham to the Political Agency in Sharjah sent to report that since friendly relations between Bahrain and Qatar had been restored, it had been decided that Qatar should receive supplies via Bahrain.
